description:
The Lofoten Gore-Tex Pants are the lightest and most breathable freeride pants designed for dynamic mountain adventures.

Developed to achieve a lighter and softer freeride pant with a great weight to durability ratio, these pants are made in a lightweight wind and waterproof recycled Gore-Tex 70D x 160D with a TR2 backer.

They have key features such as Custom-fit system™ waist adjustment, thigh ventilation from the waist to the knee, thigh pockets for essential gear and reinforcement on the inside of the lower leg. The pants have a technical fit, slightly more narrow than the other lofoten Gore-Tex Pants, but still customized for freeriding.

The optimized waistline prevents gaps in the front when attaching the pants to a bib or jacket. By having the front zip slightly facing the side, this created a small overlap that will provide a full seal. The bottom leg width that can easily accommodate a ski or snowboard boot in walk mode.

Other critical features include articulated legs, snap button tightening around the ankles, and integrated snow gaiters. The pants are compatible with all the ski bibs and the snap-in powder skirt on the jackets.

Inside leg length is 86,5 cm in size L. The length differ 2 cm up/down per size.
name: Norrona Lofoten GTX Pants - Mens
